content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 4, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: The current inventory contains string and blue dye. I need to craft white wool before I can craft blue wool. Therefore, I will first need to move one of the strings from slot 12 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I have moved one string into the crafting grid, but I still need to add another string to the adjacent slot (slot 2) in order to craft white wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

thought: I have moved two strings into the crafting grid, but I still need to add another string to the adjacent slot (slot 4) in order to craft white wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 4 with quantity 1

thought: I have moved three strings into the crafting grid, but I still need to add another string to the adjacent slot (slot 5) in order to craft white wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "string", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: I have crafted the white wool and it is in the crafting slot (slot 0). I will move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) so that I can craft blue wool.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft blue_wool. Blue_wool requires placing 1 blue_dye and 1 white_wool side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the white_wool from slot 11 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the white_wool has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the blue_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the blue_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: blue_wool
inventory=[{"type": "blue_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "brown_concrete", "quantity": 38, "index": 21}, {"type": "iron_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "green_banner", "quantity": 12, "index": 28}, {"type": "hoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 50, "index": 31}, {"type": "jukebox", "quantity": 64, "index": 35}, {"type": "prismarine_bricks", "quantity": 28, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 59, "index": 41}, {"type": "flower_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the blue_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
